title: Locations | Vitalia Senior Living
text: VITALIA® communities are spread throughout the beautiful and diverse Northeast Ohio area, and each is as exquisite as its neighborhood. Whether you want to be near the natural beauty of Cuyahoga Falls at VITALIA® Stow or prefer to be within easy access to downtown Cleveland at our Rockside location, VITALIA® has a community that you will be happy to call home. Located in the quiet suburban area near Akron, Ohio, VITALIA® Montrose offers independent living apartments, together with a brand-new rental villa community called, The V Living Experience, as well as assisted living and memory care. The stately craftsman-style architecture features wood beams, stone accents, and pillars. Enjoy amenities like fitness center, outdoor gardens, and excellent dining options. Visit VITALIA Montrose →VITALIA® Mentor is a new addition to the quality VITALIA® family of communities, offering vibrant senior living options for villas, independent living, assisted living, and memory care in Mentor, Ohio. Whether you enjoy socializing with friends or participating in fitness classes, there’s always something to do at VITALIA® Mentor. Visit VITALIA Mentor →Surrounded by parks, nature reserves, and golf courses, North Olmsted is one of the newest VITALIA® communities. This fabulous location offers Independent Living apartments and villas as well as assisted living and memory care options. Amenities abound, including a beauty salon, pool, fitness center, library, and the full-service restaurant, Kingston’s. Visit VITALIA North Olmsted →The wood and stone design of VITALIA® North Royalton evokes a mountain chalet, with soaring ceilings and light-filled community spaces. This new community offers independent living apartments, assisted living, and memory care. Independent Living villas and apartments offer feature full kitchens. However, most residents prefer to eat at the fabulous on-site Weatherby’s Restaurant. Visit VITALIA North Royalton →Situated near I77, VITALIA® Rockside is just 15 minutes from downtown Cleveland, but is nestled just far enough to feel like a city oasis. The community offers independent living apartments, assisted living, and memory care. Enjoy a quiet location with fabulous amenities, including a pool and theater as well as a full range of resident options and chef-driven dining services at 41° North Restaurant. Visit VITALIA Rockside →Enjoy vibrant living in the heart of the friendly community of Solon, Ohio. VITALIA® Solon offers independent living, assisted living, and memory care options with a fabulous array of amenities, daily events, and entertainment. Enjoy a competitive chair beach ball game or a movie in the theater before indulging in fine cuisine at The Lake Effect full-service restaurant with your friends and family. Visit VITALIA Solon →Nestled between Akron and the Cuyahoga Valley National Park, VITALIA® Stow is the perfect spot for enjoying nature with convenience. Our Stow community offers a full variety of amenities and living options, including 55+ rental villas at The V Living Experience, as well as independent living, assisted living, and memory care” Enjoy a water aerobics class or chair yoga in our pool and fitness center before joining friends and family at 1804 Restaurant for lunch in a lovely setting. Visit VITALIA Stow →Enjoy extensive services and amenities in a cozy setting at VITALIA® Strongsville. This lovely community offers assisted living and memory care, featuring a pool and fitness room, beauty salon, theater, and more. Enjoy excellent cuisine at Finley’s, the hot spot for onsite restaurant experiences where everything is made to order. Visit VITALIA Strongsville →Enjoy a fabulous location near local shopping at VITALIA® Westlake. This beautiful residence offers assisted living and memory care with high quality amenities and services, including transportation to appointments and fun excursions. Join your loved ones at Dover, the onsite restaurant that provides excellent food and service. Visit VITALIA Westlake →VITALIA® Highland Heights is the newest addition to the quality VITALIA® family of communities, offering vibrant senior living residences in Highland Heights, Ohio. Join the many new residents that have chosen VITALIA® Highland Heights as their next home. Visit VITALIA Highland Heights →VITALIA® serves and employs individuals of all faiths, regardless of race, color, gender, sexual orientation, national origin, age or handicap, except as limited by state and federal law.
